sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GenAIABTestingFeedbackChoiceBuilder</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This  give the choice list dynamically.</description>
        <name>GenAIABTestingFeedbackChoiceBuilder</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GenAIABTestingFeedbackChoiceBuilder = Class.create();
GenAIABTestingFeedbackChoiceBuilder.prototype = {
    getChoices: function() {
        var choiceList = new GlideChoiceList();
        var grChoice = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_generative_ai_feedback_score');
        grChoice.query();
        while (grChoice.next()) {
            choiceList.add(grChoice.getValue("feedback"), grChoice.getValue("feedback"));
        }
        return choiceList;
    },

    type: 'GenAIABTestingFeedbackChoiceBuilder'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-20 06:17:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4c5678fc5bc23110e4334bbca881c7dc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GenAIABTestingFeedbackChoiceBuilder</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4c5678fc5bc23110e4334bbca881c7dc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-20 08:35:46</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
